item.description:
Four Doors

We have the honor of having a guest who has developed a wonderful problem solving technique that we can use on ourselves (or on clients). This technique allows you to solve problems and/or improve any part of your life. This also allows you to balance your life.

The technique involves imagery of 4 doors or 4 different paths in search of the answer you seek. It will truly be a marvelous experience for all.

Martha Erdem is a good friend of mine and a very competent practitioner and trainer. I am sure you will enjoy her technique.

"Seek and you shall find."



Kevin

Kevin Martin, CH, MPNLP
Positive Effects
Methuen, MA
(978) 273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com
Helping People to Help Themselves

Large Meeting Rom 30-40 seats

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group
